functions.name: Get followers of
functions.description: Returns all followers for a specific Lens profile

args.name: profile identifier
args.description: A Lens profile identifier that could be either of a Lens handle, a Lens profile Id, an ENS or an Ethereum address

functions.name: Get collectors of
functions.description: Returns all collectors of a specific publication

args.name: publication identifier
args.description: A Lens publication identifier in the following format {profileId}-{publicationId}. https://docs.lens.xyz/docs/get-publication

functions.name: Get mirrorers of
functions.description: Returns all profiles who have mirrored a specific publication

args.name: publication identifier
args.description: A Lens publication identifier in the following format {profileId}-{publicationId}. https://docs.lens.xyz/docs/get-publication
